content: Ziwei Liu - Homepage Home  · Research  · Publications  · Softwares  · Team  · Services  · Awards Ziwei Liu 刘子纬 Associate Professor College of Computing and Data Science Nanyang Technological University Email: ziwei.liu at ntu.edu.sg Google Scholar GitHub Twitter Short Bio Prof. Ziwei Liu is an Associate Professor at MMLab@NTU, College of Computing and Data Science in Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. Previously, he was a research fellow in Chinese University of Hong Kong with Prof. Dahua Lin and a post-doc researcher in University of California, Berkeley with Prof. Stella Yu. His research interests include computer vision, machine learning and computer graphics. Ziwei received his Ph.D. (2013-2017) from Multimedia Lab, CUHK, advised by Prof. Xiaoou Tang and Prof. Xiaogang Wang. He is fortunate to have internships at Microsoft Research and Google Research. Ziwei is the recipient of PAMI Mark Everingham Prize, MIT TR Innovators under 35 Asia Pacific, ICBS Frontiers of Science Award, CVPR Best Paper Award Candidate, Asian Young Scientist Fellowship and Singapore President's Young Scientist Award. His works have been transferred to products, including Microsoft Pix, SenseGo and Google Clips. News [Twitter] [2025-11] Penghao is awarded ByteDance PhD Fellowship 2025.
